MonsterTrait.Name: Frenzy (1/rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the bearfolk can trigger a berserk frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While in frenzy, it gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and has advantage on attack rolls. Attack rolls made against a frenzied bearfolk have advantage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The bearfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The bearfolk makes three attacks: one with its battleaxe, one with its warhammer, and one with its bite.

MonsterAction.Name: Battleaxe
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used two-handed.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Warhammer
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used two-handed.
